thread.title: Five Things Lawmakers Are Likely to Ask Scott Pruitt About

author: Louise Radnofsky
title: Five Things Lawmakers Are Likely to Ask Scott Pruitt About

organizations.name: scott pruitt about environmental protection agency

text:
Environmental Protection Agency chief Scott Pruitt faces questions from Congress on Thursday after tripping up on a series of controversies. Here are five issues lawmakers are likely to focus on:
FLYING: In all, including international trips and a handful of chartered and military flights, Mr. Pruittâ€™s individual travel costs exceeded $150,000 in the year since he became administrator, according to records released by the EPA, including multiple trips among three dozen domestic travel bookings to his home city of Tulsa.
